panels.description: Number of connections rejected due to hitting maxclient limit
panels.title: Rejects connections

panels.description: The fragmentation is calculated as the physical memory actually used (the RSS value) divided by the amount of memory currently in use (as the sum of all the allocations performed by Redis). Because the RSS reflects the peak memory, when the (virtually) used memory is low since a lot of keys / values were freed, but the RSS is high, the ratio RSS / mem_used will be very high.
panels.title: Replication offset per sec
